features: EASY SOLUTION – Instant cold packs are perfect for any emergency situations, just squeeze a flexible instant cold pack until inner bag pops, it will turn ice cold instantly, apply on area needed, it will relief pain and reduce swelling of body.

PERFECT FOR FIRST AID KIT – disposable ice packs are the perfect fit for your first aid kit supplies, have them handy for whenever needed, without the need of getting to a freezer, keep it cool without having ice dripping allover.
LONG LASTING – cold packs get ice cold instantly and maintain its coolness for a nice length of time, long enough to do the job, depending on the surrounding temperature.
COMPACT – The compact size helps you get use of the cold packs during travel, sports games, camping, for use on any part of the body for sprains bruises or post surgeries, etc.
PACKAGE INCLUDES – 6 (5”x7”) Premium quality disposable ice packs for injuries.
body.description: These cold packs are designed to make your outdoor activity life easier and safer. With instant cold packs you can enjoy whatever sports you desire, and at the same time be peaceful knowing that in case of emergency you have in your first aid kit ice packs that will relief instantly any affected areas. Cold packs come in compact size. Fits in your travel backpack. Whenever needed you’ll have them handy and squeeze. It will turn ice cold instantly, will do the job just like it would come right out of the freezer, remaining cold for the whole time you need it to. It’s bendable and squeezable, to give you flexibility applying it wherever needed. Ideal to keep them handy everywhere: home, car, school, office, etc. Size measures 5” X 7”. It will be shipped to you in a package of 6 Ice packs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are Fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these, since my skin is pretty sensitive to pure ice. I usually need to ice my arms after allergy shots, so I invested in these. I wrap them in a towel and apply to the back of my arms. They work so nicely! Just squeeze them, wait for a pop, and shake. They will be cold instantly but not biting cold like pure ice.My only negative is the coldness does run out pretty fast- within 10-15 minutes I'd say. But, overall, they are convenient and a great thing to have on hand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very convenient for a first aid kit
reviews.reviewText: I bought 6 of these to try them out as I was concerned about the negative comments on this site, so I just tested one before I actually had a need. Squeezing from front to back was difficult but from the side worked very well with little effort. It stayed quite cold for just over 5 minutes, which is about what I would expect from a conventional freezer pack of that size. Hope the other 5 work as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Coaching
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping. Quick to get cold. Price was good. Easy to carry in first aid kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't get very cold like an ice pack but good value for the cost
reviews.reviewText: I can't be surprised because of how cheap they are, but they don't get cold like an ice pack. Mine feel more like I took water out of the fridge and put it in the bag. I still think its a good value for the cost, but if you need it to be as cold as an ice pack freezer, mine were not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my daughter that passes out easily. Keeping a few of these in the car for when she hasn’t been feeling well. Has been super helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good for emergencies but not most effective
reviews.reviewText: The Instant Cold Pack proves useful for short-term cooling needs, suitable for injuries, swelling, inflammation, and muscle strains. Despite its effectiveness, the cooling duration falls short of long-term expectations,I still would recccomend buying it anyways for needy times

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Package in a way, that punctured
reviews.reviewText: I was packaged in a way that when I opened the package, I punctured one of the ice packs. Used one of the ice packs and it was very fast and effective. Would consider alternate packing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for an emergency kit for an event but have used them more during everyday life.They are compact enough to slip a couple into a pocket book, and they get cold fast. I always keep a couple in my car.
The size of each pack is bigger than expected which is good :). All packs came well packed. Good for emergency.
